Html:
I know that a few solutions exist to making the application bar bindable.  I'm currently using the phoneFX solution to do this.  

It would certainly be nice to have this capability rolled up into the mvvm light package as an extra.  I know that it may make the project into more than what it was meant to do, but being able to bind to the app bar is a common need if you are trying to stay true to MVVM.  I still question why MS implemented the app bar in the fashion that it is.
